Message: Amazon CRC: You reached out to us regarding time off benefits or pay and additional action is required. Please check your email for a message from your case manager with next steps. Reply STOP to opt-out. Standard messaging rates may apply.
Amazon ERC: Your pay card has been funded. If you have a new Wisely card, make sure to activate it at www.activatewisely.com. Replies to this message will not be answered.
Your immigration has been initiated and your questionnaire requires your review. Please check your email to begin the process. Please reply STOP to unsubscribe to messages.
Amazon: Your new hire paperwork and I-9 form have been sent to you. Please check your email to login into MyDocs and I-9 Advantage to complete. Please reply STOP to unsubscribe to messages.
Amazon: Your I-9 form is still pending completion. Please log into I-9 Advantage and complete the form. Please reply STOP to unsubscribe to messages.
Amazon: Your MyDocs are still pending your completion. Please log into MyDocs and complete your new hire paperwork. Please reply STOP to unsubscribe to messages.
Amazon: Your I-9 Form and MyDocs are still pending your completion. Please log into the the systems and complete them. Please reply STOP to unsubscribe to messages.
TemplateName: Pending 7 day Reminder - I-9 and MD

Message: Amazon: Your start date has been changed. You should receive an email regarding the change. Please contact your recruiter for any questions. Please reply STOP to unsubscribe to messages.
Amazon: All actions required for your Day 1 are complete. You are ready to start. Please reply STOP to unsubscribe to messages.

Amazon Work Authorization - FINAL REMINDER: Hello, This is a message from Amazon. We sent an important email to you from UK-Right-to-Work-Check@amazon.com, regarding your need to complete a Right to Work Check before expiration. Please check your personal email. If you did not receive an email, please contact your HR partner and Manager urgently. Non-compliance may result in an employment suspension. Replies to this message will not be answered.
Amazon Work Authorization: Additional actions are required for work authorization. Please check your email for instructions.

Amazon Work Authorization: Your I-9 form is pending completion and must be complete within 3 business days of start date. Please check your email from I-9 Advantage to login and complete required actions. Please reply STOP to unsubscribe to messages.

Amazon Work Authorization: FINAL REMINDER: Hello, This is a message from Amazon. We sent an important email to youregarding your need to complete an I-9 form within 3 days of hire date. Please check your personal email. If you did not receive an email, please contact your HR partner and Manager urgently. Non-compliance may result in an employment suspension. Replies to this message will not be answered.
Amazon: Your background check has been initiated with our vendor, Accurate. Please check your email to begin the process. Please reply STOP to unsubscribe to messages.
